A legendary tale of timeless authenticity at Taj Coromandel
Golden Dragon offers one of the most extraordinary repertoires of Chinese cuisine and has been delighting food connoisseurs for over four decades with authentic Cantonese and Schezwan cuisine. From exotic dim sums to unique seafood delicacies and even faux meats, the menu at Golden Dragon has a breathtaking spread of varied ingredients and an even greater variety of flavours and tastes.
Having just returned from a culinary voyage across China, Chef Ho Chun Kee (William), popularly known as Chef William presents some delectable additions to the innovatively-crafted menu that is guaranteed to satisfy the most discerning palate. Savour some of Master Chef William’s new exotic classics like Emperors Sea Food Clay Pot (Lobster, Prawns, Dried and Fresh Scallops, and Fish braised with superior soya and Oyster Sauce); Wok fried Salmon with preserved beans; Tender Asparagus Shoots with wild mushroom; and Translucent Lobster and Chive Dim Sum. The Dimsum menu also includes Lobster and Asparagus Dumpling; Prawn and spinach roll with Cantonese Soya; and Vegetable Bao. For those who love their salads, go for the Warm Quail Egg and organic Pea Shoot salad with Truffle Oil Dressing. The maincourse comes with interesting additions like Steamed King Prawns (Cantonese Sauce / Garlic Sauce); Kung Pao Cuttle Fish with Cashew nut and Dry Chilly; Farm Grown Organic Potatoes Kung Pao Sauce; Corn and Asparagus Cakes with Chilly Soya; and Silken Tofu and Edamame Clay Pot with Chilly Black Bean Sauce. Savour these and more with accompaniments like Aromatic Moon Faan Rice with Shitake Mushroom; or Singapore Rice Vermicelli with Flaked Chilly and Onion.
Some old favourites continue to dot the menu like The Pekieng Duck; Har Gao; Water Chestnut and Cilantro Dumpling; and the Song of Dragon Chicken.
Trust Chef William to add a little twist to the tale with his contemporary creations like Faux Chicken Dim sum; Crackling King Prawns with Chef Signature Khoufu Sauce; Artichoke Heart and Broccoli and Pine nut dumpling; and Flambeed Toffe Vanilla Custard.
Tea paired to perfection
Don’t miss sampling some of the most distinctive teas at the Tea Bar at Golden Dragon. The Tea Bar offers Green tea with apple and cinnamon, Green tea with pineapple and apricot, Green and white tea with preach and chamomile, Green tea with vanilla, China jasmine with whole jasmine flowers, Chinese chun tea with ginseng and citrus, Organic green tea with franconian peppermint, to name a few.
